name: Six Strange Fright's (FREE VERSION)
description:
Radioactive nights, You have been hired to stop some guy that was mutating and pouring acid and chemicals inside of the animatronics. They were willing to pay you 100 dollars an hour.... All of the animatronics were moved back in parts and service, There wont be a problem right?
(GAME MADE IN CLICKTEAM FUSION, THIS IS WHY THIS APP MAY COME UP AS A VIRUS, DUE TO CLICKTEAMS COMPILER) did you know, Donating helps us make many more games and also release games?
